174  enum {
175  CPU = TMR_CLKSRC_CPU,
176  INPUT0 = TMR_CLKSRC_IC0,
177  INPUT1 = TMR_CLKSRC_IC1,
178  INPUT2 = TMR_CLKSRC_IC2,
179  INPUT3 = TMR_CLKSRC_IC3,
180  RISING = TMR_CLKSRC_EDGERISING,
181  FALLING = TMR_CLKSRC_EDGEFALLING,
182  BOTH = TMR_CLKSRC_EDGEBOTH,
183  COUNTDOWN = TMR_CLKSRC_COUNTDOWN
184  };
185 
190  int init(uint32_t freq = 1000000,
191  uint8_t clksrc = TMR_CLKSRC_CPU,
192  uint8_t pin_assign = 0,
193  uint8_t enabled_oc_chans = 0,
194  uint8_t enabled_ic_chans = 0){
195  if( open() < 0 ){
196  return -1;
197  }
198  return setattr(freq, clksrc, pin_assign, enabled_oc_chans, enabled_ic_chans);
199  }
